summary: So, recently my 3DS that I've had since 2012 finally died and won't even turn on so I was forced to buy another one. Instead I...
body:
So, recently my 3DS that I’ve had since 2012 finally died and won’t even turn on so I was forced to buy another one. Instead I bought a New 2DS because it was cheaper and I honestly never used the 3D gimmick anyway.

Well, it just came in the mail yesterday. I can’t do a System Transfer because the old 3DS won’t turn on,I can’t link the same Nintendo Network ID I used for my 3DS to my 2DS and I can’t insert my standard sized SD card into my 2DS because it only accepts Micro SD cards.

So I have two SD cards full of games that are stuck on them. Including my Pokemon Bank app that has hundreds and hundreds of Pokemon from years of playing.

So now I have to either find someone who has a 3DS that can accept standard sized SD cards so I can put all of my pokemon from Pokemon Bank onto a pokemon game and then download Pokemon Bank on my 2DS and transfer them to it but I’m afraid that won’t even work because I’m thinking if I try to log into Pokemon Bank on someone else’s system it won’t be my account even tho it should be because it’s on an SD card.

I just don’t know what to do anymore. I’m so upset about it.

summary: Early color scheme and design for Prof. Oak, Ask Ketchum and Gary Oak.  Published in CoroCoro Comics in March, April and May...
caption: Early color scheme and design for Prof. Oak, Ask Ketchum and Gary Oak.  Published in CoroCoro Comics in March, April and May 1997, this art continued to be re-published even after the anime premiered revealing their final designs.  Ash’s hat has a different design. Kagemaru Himeno, an illustrator for CoroCoro and the official Pokémon TCG, drew Ash based off this model sheet and her drawings were published over a long period of time even after the final design was revealed. Interestingly, she initially drew a brown-haired Ash, suggesting she was given an earlier model sheet.

reblog.comment: Early color scheme and design for Prof. Oak, Ask Ketchum and Gary Oak.  Published in CoroCoro Comics in March, April and May 1997, this art continued to be re-published even after the anime premiered revealing their final designs.  Ash’s hat has a different design. Interestingly, she initially drew a brown-haired Ash, suggesting she was given an earlier model sheet.

Kagemaru Himeno, an illustrator for CoroCoro and the official Pokémon TCG, drew Ash based off this model sheet and her drawings were published over a long period of time even after the final design was revealed. Interestingly, she initially drew a brown-haired Ash, suggesting she was given an earlier model sheet.

Interestingly, she initially drew a brown-haired Ash, suggesting she was given an earlier model sheet.

summary: Early color scheme and design for Jessie, James and Meowth.  Published in CoroCoro Comics in  April 1997, Team Rocket were...
caption: Early color scheme and design for Jessie, James and Meowth.  Published in CoroCoro Comics in  April 1997, Team Rocket were supposed to wear black outfits with white boots and gloves, just like the regular gen 1 Team Rocket grunt outfit - a similar look to how they appeared in the Black & White series. Meowth is depicted with beige ears, despite its official game artwork showing it to have black ears. There are a couple of other 1997 instances of beige-eared Meowth that might prove it wasn’t a mistake.

reblog.comment: Early color scheme and design for Jessie, James and Meowth.  Published in CoroCoro Comics in  April 1997, Team Rocket were supposed to wear black outfits with white boots and gloves, just like the regular gen 1 Team Rocket grunt outfit - a similar look to how they appeared in the Black & White series. Meowth is depicted with beige ears, despite its official game artwork showing it to have black ears. There are a couple of other 1997 instances of beige-eared Meowth that might prove it wasn’t a mistake.

Meowth is depicted with beige ears, despite its official game artwork showing it to have black ears. There are a couple of other 1997 instances of beige-eared Meowth that might prove it wasn’t a mistake.

Meowth is depicted with beige ears, despite its official game artwork showing it to have black ears. There are a couple of other 1997 instances of beige-eared Meowth that might prove it wasn’t a mistake.

summary: Digging through giant ant hills, its golden armor glistens in the midday sun. Though they look shy, Sandshrew are relatively...
caption:
Digging through giant ant hills, its golden armor glistens in the midday sun. Though they look shy, Sandshrew are relatively unafraid of humans and tend to be quite curious around them.

Sorry for the lack of posts this month, I was on holiday then had LFCC! Hopefully, I’ll make up the time next month!

If you like my project, please support me on Patreon and check out my Etsy store for Prints and goodies!:Link in my Bio 😁

#Pokemon #PokemonZoology #Sandshrew

summary: Honestly thou, Bourgain has had three(!) episodes now. I can’t help but wonder if he’ll have a significant role later on. And...
body:
Honestly thou, Bourgain has had three(!) episodes now. I can’t help but wonder if he’ll have a significant role later on. And like I mentioned in the tag of last post, I saw someone suggesting he could be Guzma’s father, and well… I guess it wouldn’t be such a farfetched idea. They look a bit alike.

The thing with Guzma is that, in the games, he wanted to become a Trial Captain, but was unable to become one due to some reason. It’s a conversation between Guzma and Kukui when the player meets him for the first time. This got me thinking, I’m not sure Guzma can be given this same background, because there are no Trial Captains. So what could have caused him to go so astray in Pokeani? Thou this part has me most curious, taken from Bulbapedia:

At some point, he was part of a group centered around a previous kahuna, but after it was struck down by the wrath of one of the guardian deities, Team Skull would rise from its ashes.

I guess that could still be true in Pokeani, since deities have been described as the kind that either help or well, be destructive. Anyway, since I’m still believeing in Guzma debuting in Pokeani at some point, I’m looking forward to seeing how they’ll explain Skull Gang’s origin, and Guzma’s background. :o

blog.name: lightningenergy
blog.title: Lightning Club
blog.description:
A wry observer of everyone's life. And his own. Survives by way of his sense of humor. And snacks.

Proud May/Phoebe/Elesa Fanboy

Asks & drabble requests are always welcome!

question: Agency 96
answer:
It’s a warm summer evening in Nuvema Town, and Black can’t help but stare at White as she gazes over the ocean. A minutely chilled breeze washes over them and Black shivers at the unexpected temperature change. White, however, appears unperturbed.

“Imagine if it could always be this way, even in the city.” she sighs, leaning against the fence, her lips turned in the slight of smiles.

“Woulda thought a producer would like having more people to advertise to.”

“I mean the atmosphere,” White clarifies. “It’s so peaceful and relaxing…”

Black, who prefers to keep busy as to keep his mind clear, has to agree. He did grow up here, after all, and he’d be lying if some part of him didn’t miss it. Though, he might just be saying that because White is here, and he finds himself more focused on her than anything…

blog.description: Welcome to my main blog! This is where I post my personal art here. So please, feel free to browse :) If you like what you see here, please visit the following links below:

summary: I'm so happy I'm gonna scream! In fact...  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH note:...
caption:
I’m so happy I’m gonna scream! In fact… 

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

note: Holy crap, I finally finished shading every page and it’s before the end of July! But I still need to add backgrounds, dialogues, and speech bubbles and other stuff. However, compared to before, the rest of the task will be easy, and will be over within a week or less

Release date is soon. Possibly in the first or second week of August.

And if you like my work, please support me on Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/mgx0
